articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Kanji Inoki
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Kanji Inoki
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is advisor to the DPRK-Japan Friendship Association, Saturday met and had a talk with Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councillors of Japan, and his party on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Kanji Inoki
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Kanji Inoki
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councillors of Japan, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was conveyed to Ri Su Yong, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who doubles as advisor to the DPRK-Japan Friendship Association, by Kanji Inoki on Saturday.

articles.title: National Reconciliation Council Warns Park Geun Hye Not to Spout Anti-DPRK Invectives
articles.content:
National Reconciliation Council Warns Park Geun Hye Not to Spout Anti-DPRK Invectives
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye is keen on reeling off invectives slandering the social system in the DPRK almost every day while going against the unanimous desire of the fellow countrymen for reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					 She talked about "sign of serious breakdown", "emergency enough to arouse concern" and even spouted without hesitation such hideous invectives like "out of common sense" and "tyranny", daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 She is going busy soliciting for "cooperation for pressure" on the DPRK while slandering the DPRK's line on simultaneous development of the front fronts as "isolation" and "self-ruin". She is even spouting such absurd sophism as "leading the north to changes" and "separation of inhabitants from the authorities," openly disclosing her ambition for "unification of social systems".
					
					 The National Reconciliation Council in a warning notice on Saturday said that Park can never be pardoned for distorting the truth, mocking the nation and disturbing the world.
					
					 The Council, in reflection of the will of the enraged army and people of the DPRK to inflict merciless punishment on Park, sternly warned the traitor, hideous confrontation manic and the nation's biggest trouble-maker, as she dares challenge the inviolable dignity and social system of the DPRK and makes last-ditch efforts to prolong her remaining dirty days.
					
					1. Traitor Park should stop senseless gibberish, clearly understanding that her talk about "sign of breakdown" and "emergency" would only disclose her ignorance of the social system in the DPRK.
					
					2. She should clearly see through the sky-high spirit of the DPRK making leaping progress toward the eminence of the final victory along the path indicated by the line of simultaneous development of the two fronts and stop making such senseless remarks as "isolation" and "self-ruin".
					
					3. She should stop acting rashly while uttering such words as "leading the north to changes" and "living of inhabitants", clearly understanding that her ambition for "unification of social systems" is a pipedream.
					
					 We have on record all the invectives and crimes committed by Park against the DPRK and will thoroughly and mercilessly punish her on the day when the great victory of the national reunification will be won.
					
					 She will be made to see before long what high price she has to pay for her reckless confrontation vituperation.

articles.title: Truth behind Group Abduction of Women Employees of DPRK Can Never Be Concealed
articles.content:
Truth behind Group Abduction of Women Employees of DPRK Can Never Be Concealed
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- More than 150 days have passed since Korean women working abroad were taken to south Korea after being abducted in group by gangsters of the puppet Intelligence Service.
					 Despite strong protest and denunciation by the public at home and abroad the puppet forces have resorted to vicious and cruel "defection operation" against those abductees. Recently the gangsters worked out a plan to hold conspiratorial "interview" in a bid to describe the incident as a "defection from the north at free will".
					
					 The DPRK Emergency Measure Committee for Rescuing Abducted Persons Saturday released a detailed report to reveal the despicable nature of the desperate efforts made by the evil boss of Chongwadae and her group to dodge the crime of the group abduction and responsibility for it.
					
					 Revealing the thrice-cursed group abduction by the puppet forces, the detailed report said:
					
					 The case happened in Ningbo, Zhejiang Province, China on April 5 but the tentacles of the puppet Intelligence Service gangsters began stretching when they were operating a restaurant in Yanji, Jilin Province.
					
					 Gangsters of the puppet Intelligence Service intentionally approached the head of the restaurant who ran into heavy debts by hanging out with brokers and leading corrupt life, and put a bridle on him in a crafty way.
					
					 Pursuant to a scenario mapped out by their superior, the field gangsters of the puppet Intelligence Service prodded the head of the restaurant surnamed Ho who had already been reduced to their cat's paw into collecting passports of the women employees and going through departure formalities in secrecy. They even gave him 60 000 RMB.Y to buy plane tickets for Malaysia.
					
					 The women employees came to know that they were abducted only after they boarded the plane bound for south Korea and demanded return to homeland. At that time gangsters of the puppet Intelligence Service let Ho appease them with such words that "they are going to south Korea for a special duty" and forcibly took them to south Korea at last.
					
					 Disclosing the cruel and vicious "defection operation" conducted by the puppet group, the report continued:
					
					 The puppet group keen on escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen, tried by hook or by crook to describe the group abduction as "defection from the north at free will" in a bid to shore up the bankrupt racket for sanctions against the DPRK. 
					
					 They forced "defection" upon the DPRK women day and night by injecting Ringer's solution to them who were exhausted for strong mental shock and hunger strike.
					
					 Nevertheless, the puppet forces are claiming that "the DPRK women are under investigation in good health and they are staying at Lotte Hotel and listening to news of the south side and touring various places to be accustomed to the reality" in a bid to dodge domestic and foreign public criticism of the despicable "operation."
					
					 The detailed report denounced the mean behavior of the puppet forces to cover up the truth about the group allurement and abduction.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group, driven into a tight corner for having failed to conceal its group allurement and abduction due to the daily-growing criticism, protest and condemnation by domestic and foreign public, is working hard to stage a conspiratorial broadcasting "interview" with the DPRK's women employees.
					
					 The tricksters and plot-breeders of the puppet Intelligence Service are conducting repeated rehearsals for "interviews" with the DPRK's women employees in such a way as changing reporters and observers every time.
					
					 It admits of no argument that the true aim of the rehearsals is to make the abductees hard to distinguish the real "interview" from the false one and air only the program judged as orchestrated according to their scenario.
					
					 The puppet forces are scheming to stage the above-said farce before and after Harvest Moon Day.
					
					 This indicates that, much upset by the strong public protest at home and abroad, they floated such false rumor that the DPRK's women employees settled in the society after going through inquiry by the authorities concerned and are hatching plots to justify their crimes by painting the abduction as "defection from north at free will" at any cost.
					
					 The puppet forces should clearly know that their base "operation" for forcing defection upon the abductees despite strong protest by the public at home and abroad would only bring to light their wicked nature as chieftains of allurement and abduction and terrorism and plot-breeding.
					
					 Noting that the puppet forces can never evade the responsibility for the hideous group allurement and abduction, the detailed report stressed the Korean people would surely force the wicked confrontation maniacs and devils without an equal in the world to pay a high price for their treachery and crimes against humanity.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of People's Armed Forces Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of People's Armed Forces Back Home
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces headed by Army Col. General Yun Tong Hyon, vice-minister, returned home on Saturday after attending the international military technology forum "Army-2016" held in Russia.

articles.title: Participants in Int'l Trade Fair Depart
articles.content:
Participants in Int'l Trade Fair Depart
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Delegations of Malaysia, Singapore, China, Italy and Vietnam left here for home on Saturday after participating in the 12th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair.         Earlier leaving here was the German delegation.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations on a visit to the DPRK on its 68th founding anniversary toured Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home in Mangyongdae, the guests looked round the historical relics preserved there, being briefed on the immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung and his revolutionary career.
					
					 They went round the revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 They also visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and the Youth Movement Museum.

articles.title: DPRK University Students Strive for Another World Contest
articles.content:
DPRK University Students Strive for Another World Contest
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Students of Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK are now intent on the preparations for another international college programming contest.
					 They won a trophy, two gold prizes and two speed prizes in the Asian regional preliminaries of the 40th ICPC (International College Programming Contest) last year and placed the second at the 40th ICPC in May this year.
					
					 According to Jong Kwang Byol, an instructor of the university's group of information science, the university is to host the Asian regional preliminaries for the 41st ICPC in November.
					
					 He said that their immediate goal is to win a gold medal at the forthcoming regional preliminaries and the ultimate goal is to hold supremacy in IT field, adding that most of students and instructors of the group are youths in their twenties.

articles.title: DPRK Students Contribute to Building Sports Power
articles.content:
DPRK Students Contribute to Building Sports Power
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- University students of the DPRK have made big contribution to turning the country into a sports power.
					 A few months ago, the DPRK teams of men and women from various universities won trophies at the IHF Trophy Tournament East and Southeast Asia held in Hong Kong, China.
					
					 Taking part in the tournament were many teams from countries and regions, including Vietnam, Mongolia and Taipei of China.
					
					 In the tournament, Ri Kyong Song of Kim Il Sung University and Choe Pong Im of Kim Chaek University of Technology were awarded the men's and women's best prizes.
					
					 Ri Kyong Song told KCNA that foreign experts were unanimous in saying the DPRK teams, made up of university students, are very strong in mental power.
					
					 He stressed that they, student athletes, would further cultivate their sports technique to prove successful in international games of higher level.

articles.title: Natural Broad-spectrum Antiviral Liquor Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Natural Broad-spectrum Antiviral Liquor Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- A natural broad-spectrum antiviral liquor was developed in the DPRK. Its main ingredients are burdock and foxglove.
					 The liquor is, in particular, efficacious for respiratory diseases like measles and influenza with no side effect.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye for Pulling up DPRK over Its Nuclear Deterrence for Self-Defense
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye for Pulling up DPRK over Its Nuclear Deterrence for Self-Defense
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea blustered at the recent talks with Obama that the DPRK's ballistic rocket firing drill for self-defense is a "threat to security in Northeast Asia" and "reckless provocation". She went the lengths of crying out for "strong counteraction" together with the U.S.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday terms it stereotyped rubbish groundlessly taking issue with the DPRK over its just measures for bolstering nuclear deterrence for self-defense.
					
					 Irony is that Park is seized with the wild ambition to stifle the DPRK in collusion with the U.S., unaware of the trend of the times, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. could make a unilateral nuclear blackmail against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is exasperated by the strong military steps being taken by the DPRK in a phased way.
					
					 The plight of Park was so wretched as to imprudently behave, vociferating about "strong counteraction" and "warning" by relying on her American master.
					
					 The DPRK will not change its option though such American colonial servant and dirty prostitute of foreign forces as Park Geun Hye is making such fuss.
					
					 The Park group had better stop acting rashly, clearly understanding that their reckless acts would only precipitate their self-ruin.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Spreading Fresh False Story
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Spreading Fresh False Story
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- These days the U.S. is busy spreading new false stories such as "story of abduction of American university student" as part of its smear campaign against the DPRK.
					 The U.S. let riff-raffs of plot-breeding organizations including the "North Korea Freedom Coalition" of the U.S. and the "meeting of families of north's abductees" to say that an American university student who disappeared in China 12 years ago might have been abducted by north Korea. The U.S. calls for "signature campaign" through internet in demand of passing a "draft resolution" on the incident through Congress. Furthermore, the U.S. prodded Western media into floating the story that "hundreds of Americans reported missing were in prison of north Korea," claiming this was secret information obtained from data base of the CIA.
					
					 The fact that the CIA and many anti-DPRK plot-breeding organizations, its tools, were involved in spreading the above-said false propaganda suffices to guess the purpose and the whole aspect of the charade.
					
					 This is another politically-motivated provocation aimed at impairing the ever-rising prestige of the DPRK in the international arena as it is nothing but a psychological warfare putting into the shade the Hitler fascist clique in the light of its style and method.
					
					 The U.S. tried to use the doctrine of the fascist maniac that "telling a lie hundred times makes people believe it" and experience of the anti-Soviet propaganda that "radios and publications brought 'victory' which could not be achieved by nuclear blackmail." However, the above-said chicanery proved to be false from the beginning.
					
					 The American media, expressing suspicion about the case, terming it "shocking news," conveyed the fact that the Chinese authorities drew the conclusion that the American university student might have drowned at that time.
					
					 Contrary to assertions of tricksters that a "defector from the north" saw the American university student in Pyongyang, the mother of "missing student" said she did not believe blindly press reports and the U.S. Department of State said at the beginning that there was no evidence proving it and it was under discussion with the Chinese authorities.
					
					 Against this backdrop, the "North Korea Freedom Coalition" is claiming that the U.S. Department of State and intelligence authorities are coordinating the investigation into the incident with Japan, south Korea and others. This makes clear in to what direction the "investigation" would be conducted.
					
					 As seen above, the recent false propaganda is a continuation of the anti-DPRK moves pursuant to the U.S. policy and a prelude to a new war.
					
					 Such false propaganda is little short of a preemptive attack heralding an actual physical war tomorrow as it is a common practice in modern wars for a psychological warfare to reach the height before the full involvement of means for physical war.
					
					 The Korean peninsula is technically at war as the world's biggest nuclear strike means are massively deployed for actions and there is neither judicial nor institutional mechanism on the peninsula to avert a war.
					
					 The false propaganda launched by the U.S. under the touch-and-go-situation is designed to secure a pretext for igniting a war of aggression. 
					
					 The U.S., however, is seriously mistaken.
					
					 The DPRK has its own mode of counteraction to foil any provocation of the enemies at one stroke.
					
					 The successful nuclear warhead explosive test of the DPRK is part of practical counteraction against the threats and sanctions of the U.S. and other hostile forces pulling up the DPRK over the exercise of its right to self-defence in persistent denial of the strategic position of the DPRK, a full-fledged nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The DPRK is always ready to beat back any enemy attack.
					
					 Steadfast is the will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to take the toughest counteraction against the enemies.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet National Assembly Accused of Shunning Issue of THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet National Assembly Accused of Shunning Issue of THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The Action for Checking THAAD Deployment in south Korea held a press conference outside the puppet National Assembly on September 6 accusing the NA of sidestepping the issue of deploying THAAD.
					 The organization said there continue confusion and conflict due to the moves of the authorities to deploy THAAD unilaterally.
					
					 The authorities are insisting that THAAD deployment is aimed to cope with the "north's nuclear and missile threat" but it has already been proved through the reports of the U.S. Department of Defense and Congress that THAAD is ineffective in light of the topography of the Korean peninsula, the organization charged.
					
					 It held that the authorities are escalating the military confrontation on the Korean peninsula and thus causing uneasiness among the people and pushing forward THAAD deployment by using their psychology.

articles.title: Joint Protest of Inhabitants of Songju, Kimchon of S. Korea against THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
Joint Protest of Inhabitants of Songju, Kimchon of S. Korea against THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Inhabitants in Songju County and Kimchon City of North Kyongsang Province of south Korea held a joint rally in Seoul on September 8 in protest against the U.S. moves to deploy THAAD, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 In the middle of the rally the participants headed for the U.S. Embassy to convey a written protest against THAAD deployment to it.
					
					 Representatives of inhabitants thrust a written protest to the U.S. Embassy despite police's suppression.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants visited the bereaved families who were staging a strike in demand of the probe into the truth about ferry Sewol disaster at the Kwanghwamun plaza, and encouraged them.
					
					 Prior to it, inhabitants met with the representative of the Minju Party and noted that the on-going action is the issue on which hinges the right to existence. They said they would turn out in the drive for a total cancellation and reexamination of the plan for deploying THAAD.

articles.title: Koreans in China Condemn Hong Yong Phyo's Invectives against DPRK
articles.content:
Koreans in China Condemn Hong Yong Phyo's Invectives against DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The Harbin Regional Association under the General Association of Koreans in China made public a statement on September 5 condemning Hong Yong Phyo, puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, for reeling off invectives against the DPRK.
					 The statement recalled that at an international meeting on August 29 Hong claimed that if the north dismantled nuclear weapons, it would get big benefit, talking about pressure of the international community.
					
					 No matter what sophism Hong may spout, the DPRK will remain unchanged in its principled stand, the statement said.

articles.title: Koreans in China Reject Moves for Deploying THAAD in S. Korea
articles.content:
Koreans in China Reject Moves for Deploying THAAD in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Organizations under the General Association of Koreans in China issued statements calling for opposing the south Korean puppet group's moves to deploy THAAD and for achieving great concord of all Koreans.
					 A spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association in a statement on September 2 denounced Park Geun Hye for threatening the destiny of the nation by deciding to deploy THAAD as the U.S. stooge.
					
					 THAAD cannot be deployed in any place of south Korea, the statement noted.
					
					 The Liaoning Regional Association in a statement on September 4 noted that it can never pardon the moves of the south Korean puppet forces and the U.S. imperialists to deploy THAAD.
					
					 The Harbin City branch of the Harbin Regional Association in a statement on September 4 said if the puppet forces deploy THAAD despite rebuff of the neighboring countries, it will be rejected and cursed and driven into an abyss of ruin.

articles.title: Speech Made by Kim Jong Un at 9th Congress of Youth League Carried by Indian Newspaper
articles.content:
Speech Made by Kim Jong Un at 9th Congress of Youth League Carried by Indian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- "Let Us Usher in a Golden Age of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth Movement", the speech made by Marshal Kim Jong Un at the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, was carried by the September 1-15 issue of the Indian newspaper World's Mirror.
					 The newspaper carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Lectures Given in Different Countries
articles.content:
Lectures Given in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given by the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea and the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups and at Makerere University of Uganda on September 3 and 4 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia said that the founding of the DPRK was a significant event which declared the genuine people's power before the world. He went on:
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK after the liberation of Korea as he created precious experience for building the people's power during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 Under his wise guidance the DPRK won brilliant victory in the fierce war against the U.S. imperialists and developed into a socialist state.
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Jong Il overcame all ordeals and difficulties and firmly defended the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK with his original Songun politics.
					
					 The DPRK is demonstrating its might as a nuclear weapons state no one dares provoke as it is upholding the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un at the top posts.
					
					 We are convinced that the DPRK will meet challenges of the hostile forces and successfully accomplish the socialist cause and national reunification.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Makerere University of Uganda said the DPRK won victories only under the wise guidance of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed by Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed by Swiss Bodies
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- September 9 marks the significant day when the great President Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK.
					 The Swiss Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a statement on Sept. 3.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the Ninth Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the Fourth Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK were held with splendor and the respected HE Kim Jong Un was elected chairman of the WPK and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK. These significant events are more brilliantly decorating the September holiday this year.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un turned the DPRK into a world power no one dares provoke, true to the Songun cause of President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Under the wise guidance of HE Kim Jong Un the army and people of the DPRK shattered all provocations of the U.S. imperialists and their followers.
					
					 Korea will certainly be reunified thanks to the fair proposals indicated by President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced by Nigerian Paper
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced by Nigerian Paper
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The DPRK regarding the Juche idea as the guidelines of its activities is, indeed, a genuine people's country which comprehensively guarantees all rights and dignity of the people.
					 The Nigerian paper Nigerian Observer said this in an article titled "People's country" on September 1.
					
					 The paper said that the DPRK is enforcing the highest-level universal 12-year compulsory education in the world, in which the state guarantees all educational expenses.
					
					 The universal free medical care is completely and thoroughly free one as everything necessary for medical care can be accessed free.
					
					 Dwelling houses were built by state investment and provided to the people free of charge.
					
					 Ordinary scientists, technicians and workers moved into Changjon Street, Unha Scientists Street, Wisong Scientists Dwelling District, Mirae Scientists Street and many other dwelling houses built in the DPRK and provided to them free of charge in recent years.
					
					 All activities in the DPRK are oriented to improving the people's living standard.
					
					 The Rungna People's Pleasure Park, the Masikryong Ski Resort, the May Day Stadium and other mass cultural life centres were built or remodeled on a world level, bringing happiness to the people.
					
					 Okryu Children's Hospital, Ryugyong Dental Hospital and new medical centres have been wonderfully built.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Embassy in Moscow hosted a reception on September 7 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present there on invitation were Kirill Stepanov, vice-minister of Development of Far East who doubles as secretary of State of the Ministry, roving ambassadors of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity, the editor-in-chief of newspaper Zavtra and other officials of the government, political parties, organizations and media of Russia, foreign diplomatic envoys. On hand were the DPRK ambassador to Russia and his embassy officials.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the art work depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together.
					
					 They went round photos dealing with the undying feats of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kirill Stepanov in a speech said Russia is a country which was the first to establish diplomatic relations with the DPRK, adding the relations between the two countries have successfully developed, overcoming ordeals of history.
					
					 To boost friendship and cooperation with the DPRK presents itself as the most important issue in realizing Russia's foreign policy, he said, expressing the will to value the precious tradition of the bilateral relations, overcome the temporary difficulties, develop cooperation in economic, cultural and all other fields and make proactive efforts to ensure peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 He wished the Korean people bigger successes in the struggle to build a socialist power and reunify the country under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: CRN advierte a Park Geun-hye sobre consecuencias de su calumnia anti-RPDC
articles.content:
CRN advierte a Park Geun-hye sobre consecuencias de su calumnia anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 10 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La traidora surcoreana Park Geun-hye maldice casi todos los dias sobre el regimen de la parte connacional desafiando a la unanime aspiracion nacional a la reconciliacion, unidad y reunificacion. 
					Hablo de las supuestas "senales serias de division" y "estado emergente de nivel preocupante" y se atrevio a calumniar sin escrupulos la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea usando expresiones como "insensato" y "tirania". 
					
					E insulto con mala intencion la linea de la parte connacional sobre el desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares diciendo que esta causara el "aislamiento" y "autodestruccion". Y al mismo tiempo, anda de un lado para otro suplicando la "colaboracion en presionar" a la RPDC y expone abiertamente su ambicion de "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" con sofismas como "induccion de cambio" y "separar a las autoridades y los habitantes". 
					
					El Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional, en su acta de advertencia publicada el dia 10, asevera que no puede perdonar que la traidora Park engane la opinion publica mundial distorsionando la verdad y burlandose de la nacion. 
					
					Reflejando la voluntad de castigo implacable de todos los militares y habitantes coreanos muy indignados, el Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional advierte seriamente como sigue a la traidora Park Geun-hye, maniaca de enfrentamiento fratricida y fuente de desastres nacionales, que esta desesperada para mantener su sucia vida restante desafiando atrevidamente a la sagrada dignidad y regimen de la RPDC:
					
					1. La traidora Park Geun-hye debe dejar de decir disparates como "senales de division" y "estado de emergencia" que demuestran solo su ignorancia sobre el regimen de la RPDC. 
					
					2. Ella no debe insistir mas en el "aislamiento" y "autodestruccion" viendo correctamente el impetu de la RPDC que logra saltos vertiginosos hacia la victoria final manteniendo la linea de desarrollo paralelo. 
					
					3. Ella debe actuar con prudencia sin mencionar la "induccion de cambio" y "vida de la poblacion" teniendo presente que su ambicion de "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" es una ilusion nunca realizable. 
					
					 Tenemos registrados todos los chismes y crimenes anti-RPDC cometidos por Park y ajustaremos las cuentas de ellos de manera consecuente e implacable en el dia de victoria de la guerra por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					  Ella vera pronto cuan tragico le van a costar sus disparates conflictivos.

articles.title: Entidad coreana revela detalles del incidente de rapto a ciudadanas norcoreanas
articles.content:
Entidad coreana revela detalles del incidente de rapto a ciudadanas norcoreanas
Pyongyang, 10 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Pasaron mas de 150 dias desde cuando las ciudadanas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fueron raptadas en colectivo y llevadas por la fuerza al Sur de Corea por los gangsteres del Servicio de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea.
					Pese a la protesta y condena de la opinion publica interna y externa, las autoridades surcoreanas recurrieron a la sucia "operacion de sumision" contra las victimas de rapto.
					
					En los ultimos dias, tratan de organizar una intrigante "entrevista" para describir el caso como "salida voluntaria del Norte de Corea".
					
					La Comision de Medidas Emergentes por la Salvacion de las Victimas del Secuestro Forzoso de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 10 una informacion detallada para revelar ese crimen cometido por la inquilina diabolica de Chongwadae y su camarilla y sus sucios movimientos para eludir la responsabilidad.
					
					El documento revelo primero los detalles del incidente como sigue:
					
					Aunque el presente caso ocurrio el 5 de abril pasado en Ningbo de la provincia de Zhejiang de China, los gangsteres del Servicio de Inteligencia (SI) del Sur de Corea comenzaron a extender sus garras desde cuando nuestras muchachas gestionaban un restaurante en Yanji de la provincia de Jilin.
					
					Ellos se acercaron intencionalmente al gerente de apellido Ho del restaurante y le tendieron una trampa aprovechando los defectos de este tipejo codicioso que contrajo muchas deudas en los negocios con los intermediarios y llevaba una vida corrupta y lujuriosa.
					
					Segun el plan trazado por los superiores, los agentes del SI, que trabajaban en el terreno, hicieron al gerente Ho, convertido ya en su lacayo, realizar en secreto los tramites de salida de China con los pasaportes de todas las empleadas y le entregaron 60 mil yuanes para que comprara los pasajes del avion con destino a Malasia.
					
					Cuando ya estuvieron a bordo del avion con rumbo al Sur de Corea, las muchachas se enteraron de que fueron raptadas y protestaron a los conspiradores surcoreanos demandando la devolucion a la patria.
					
					Entonces, los agentes surcoreanos ordenaron a Ho enganar a las chicas diciendoles que "tienen que ir al Sur de Corea para cumplir una mision especial" y se las llevaron por la fuerza al Sur de Corea.
					
					A continuacion, la informacion denuncio la atroz y obstinada "operacion de sumision" realizada por las autoridades surcoreanas sobre las victimas.
					
					Enloquecidos por el enfrentamiento fratricida, los titeres surcoreanos hicieron todo lo posible por describir el secuestro colectivo como "fuga voluntaria del Norte" a fin de dar alientos a su inefectiva campana de sancion anti-RPDC. 
					
					Y obligaron la "sumision" inyectando hasta Ringer a las muchachas norcoreanas que estaban exhaustadas por el choque mental y el ayuno.
					
					Sin embargo, para eludir la avalancha de criticas de la opinion publica interna y externa sobre la "operacion de sumision", ellos mintieron que las secuestradas "estan sometidas a la investigacion con buena salud", "prueban la vida elegante en el hotel Lotte" y "pasan el proceso de adaptacion a la realidad surcoreana viendo el noticiero y haciendo excursiones". 
					
					El documento denuncio ademas los sucios movimientos de los titeres surcoreanos para ocultar la verdad del secuestro colectivo. 
					
					Al ver que no pueden ocultar nunca mas la verdad ante las cada dia mas fuertes criticas y protestas del interior y exterior, ellos tratan ahora de organizar una "entrevista" radial con las secuestradas. 
					
					Los conspiradores del Servicio de Inteligencia organizan repetidamente el ensayo de "entrevista" cambiando en cada ocasion a los reporteros y observadores.
					
					Su verdadera intencion es confundir a las muchachas norcoreanas si es ensayo o la "entrevista" de verdad y difundir por la radio solo las partes que salieran como lo planificado.
					
					La entrevista esta programada con motivo de Chusok (15 de agosto lunar, fiesta folclorica de Corea). 
					
					Hace poco, los titeres surcoreanos, presionados por las fuertes denuncias, divulgaron el rumor falso de que las secuestradas pasaron la investigacion de autoridades competentes y ya fueron ubicadas en la sociedad surcoreana.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, trazan el complot para justificar su crimen describiendolo como "fuga voluntaria del Norte". 
					
					Ellos deben tener presente que su obstinada "operacion de sumision" pondra mas evidente su abominable naturaleza de raptor, terrorista y conspirador de peor calana. 
					
					Esos maniacos de enfrentamiento no pueden eludir nunca la responsabilidad y pagaran sin falta el precio de su crimen antinacional e inmoral.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena disparates anti-RPDC de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena disparates anti-RPDC de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 10 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En recientes conversaciones con Obama, la traidora Park Geun-hye dijo que "hara frente rotundo" junto con EE.UU. al ejercicio de lanzamiento de cohete balistico para la autodefensa de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, describiendolo como "amenaza para la seguridad regional del Nordeste Asiatico" y "provocacion imprudente".
					 Es otro chisme rutinario para cuestionar la justa medida de la RPDC por el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa.
					
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este sabado y prosigue:
					
					  Lo ridiculo del caso es que Park esta cautivada de la ambicion de aplastar a la RPDC en contubernio con EE.UU. sin justipreciar todavia la corriente de la epoca actual.
					
					  Ya termino una vez por todas el tiempo en que EE.UU. chantajeaba unilateralmente a la RPDC con armas nucleares.
					
					  EE.UU. esta aturdido ante las fuertes medidas militares que toma la RPDC de modo multiple y sucesivo.
					
					  Es miserable la situacion de Park Geun-hye que partiendo de su confianza en su amo flojo (EE.UU.), actua con imprudencia pronunciando palabras insolentes como "enfrentarse rotundamente" y "advertir".
					
					  Las quejas de Park, esclava colonial de EE.UU. y prostituta de las fuerzas foraneas, no podran cambiar la opcion de la RPDC.
					
					  La camarilla titere surcoreana debe conocer bien que su conducta imprudente acelerara la autodestruccion.

articles.title: ACNC comenta nueva farsa de EE.UU. contra la RPDC
articles.content:
ACNC comenta nueva farsa de EE.UU. contra la RPDC
Pyongyang, 10 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En estos dias, Estados Unidos se dedica a orquestar nueva farsa contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 Por ejemplo, sigue difundiendo rumores absurdos como el "secuestro de estudiante norteamericano" por el Norte de Corea.
					
					  A instigacion de EE.UU., los fulanos y menganos de la "Alianza por la Libertad del Norte de Corea" de EE.UU. y la "Union de familiares de secuestrados por el Norte" del Sur de Corea chismearon que "parece que esta secuestrado por el Norte de Corea" un estudiante estadounidense desaparecido hace 12 anos en China.
					
					  Por una parte, reclama iniciar la "recogida de firmas" por via de Internet en demanda de la aprobacion del "proyecto de resolucion" sobre ese tema en el Congreso y, por la otra, difundio a traves de los medios occidentales de prensa el rumor de que "cientos de desaparecidos norteamericanos estan encarcelados en el Norte de Corea", citando un "documento secreto" adquirido desde la base de datos de la Agencia Central de Inteligencia.
					
					  El hecho de que estan detras de ese rumor la CIA y sus lacayunas entidades intrigantes anti-RPDC basta para conocer el objetivo y los aspectos verdaderos del presente complot.
					
					  Esta campana psicologica, que supera la de la camarilla fascista de Hitler tanto en su forma como en su metodo, deviene una provocacion politica encaminada a calumniar la dignidad de la RPDC que crece en la escena internacional.
					
					  EE.UU. intento volver a usar la doctrina del maniaco fascista de que si miente cien veces, lo creeran como verdad y sus experiencias logradas en la ofensiva anti-URSS de que "la radio y las publicaciones trajeron la 'victoria' no lograda ni con el chantaje nuclear", pero el caracter fraudulento de la presente farsa se ha revelado por si sola desde el inicio.
					
					  Hasta los medios estadounidenses que informaron el "incidente" en cuestion, expresaron la duda calificandolo de una "sorpresa" y aduciendo la conclusion de las autoridades chinas de que es posible que el desaparecido haya sido muerto ahogado en el rio.
					
					  A diferencia de la insistencia de los conspiradores en que un "fugitivo norcoreano" vio al estudiante norteamericano en Pyongyang, su madre dijo que no cree a ciegas las informaciones de la prensa y el Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. se limito a declarar al principio que no hay las pruebas y estaba consultando con las autoridades chinas.
					
					  Bajo tales circunstancias, una entidad intrigante de EE.UU. disparatea que "el Departamento de Estado y las autoridades de inteligencia estan coordinando la investigacion correspondiente con Japon, el Sur de Corea y otros".  Esto insinua claro a que se dirigira la "investigacion". 
					
					  Asi, el presente complot es la continuacion de la campana de aplastamiento contra la RPDC segun la politica de EE.UU. y el preludio de provocacion de nueva guerra.
					
					  El funcionamiento pleno de los medios de guerra psicologica antes de la operacion total de los medios fisicos de guerra deviene la costumbre comun de la guerra moderna.
					
					  Se puede decir que se encuentra ahora en el estado de guerra la Peninsula Coreana donde el mayor numero de medios de golpe nuclear de este mundo estan concentrados y enfrentados y no existe ningun aparato legal ni institucional para prevenir la guerra.
					
					  La RPDC tiene su propio modo de enfrentamiento con que puede frustrar rotundamente y de un instante cualquier provocacion de los enemigos.
					
					La reciente prueba de explosion de ojiva nuclear es una de las contramedidas sustanciales frente a la amenaza y la sancion de EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles que niegan persistentemente la posicion estrategica de la RPDC, digno pais poseedor de armas nucleares, y cuestionan perversamente el ejercicio del derecho a la autodefensa.
					
					  La RPDC esta preparada siempre para pasar al contraataque si los enemigos se atreven a atacarla.
					
					  Es inconmovible la voluntad superintransigente del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
